none: Photograph of President Woodrow Wilson,  two American flags.  Red, white, and blue print.
Pacific Northwest Sheet Music : from the Ashford Collection

Emblem of freedom, how dearly I hail thee
For four voices (S. A. T. B. or T. T. B. B.)
Front cover states that this song is: "dedicated to President Woodrow Wilson".
